name: Tie ~ Seascape
description:
Each tie is created by hand using traditional printing methods. The fabric is first dyed, then printed using up to six silk screens with fabric dye pastes and discharge dye pastes, the fabric is then steamed to set the dyes and carefully hand washed before making the ties by hand!

Each tie will vary slightly, this is the beauty of hand printing

Each is approx 150 x 5 cm and can be worn two ways due to the way the ties are printed and made. The ties are made with Botany serge wool which has a beautiful handle and weight - perfect for ties.

All are designed printed and made by Judy in her studio in Dundee.

All designs are ©judyscott2013

Colours may vary slightly due to computer monitors and their settings

name: silk scarf ~ sea pink
description:
This scarf captures the corals and pinks found along the shores of East Scotland, the sea pink flowers found on the grassy slopes leading to the beaches and the glorious coral seaweeds in soft pink through to deep burnt orange.


Each scarf is dyed and screen printed by hand using traditional methods ~ this means using up to six silk screens, fabric dye pastes, discharge dye pastes, steaming the fabric to set the dyes and then careful hand washing all before hand rolling the scarf edges! 
The scarves all vary slightly, this is the beauty of hand printing.

Each scarf measures 90 x 90 cm approximately and is made with lustrous habotai silk and comes beautifully presented in a gift box.

All are designed printed and made by Judy in her studio in Dundee and complement any outfit.

All designs are ©judyscott2013

name: silk scarf ~ seagreen
description:
Inspired by the incredible colours from deep sea green to the bright coral seaweeds found along Scotland's shores.

The scarves all vary slightly, this is the beauty of hand printing.

Each scarf measures 90 x 90 cm approximately and is made with lustrous habotai silk and comes beautifully presented in a gift box.
